text: Jackie Brookner (1945 – May 15, 2015) was an American ecological artist, writer, and educator.Eleanor Heartney, “Mapping a Better World,” Art in America, Oct. 2003, p. 114 She worked with ecologists, design professionals, engineers, communities, and policy-makers on water remediation/public art projects for parks, wetlands, rivers, and urban stormwater runoff. Brookner died of cancer in her New York City home, aged 69.In Memoriam Jackie Brookner (1945-2015) ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:American artists Category:Educators from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Writers from Providence, Rhode Island Category:Educators from Rhode Island
title: Jackie Brookner
